entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
